name: Query ChatNT
description: Call ChatNT to answer a question about a DNA sequence using transformer-based language model
install: cd /tmp && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git biomni_repo && cd biomni_repo && pip install -e . && pip install transformers torch

inputs.name: QUESTION
inputs.description: Question to ask about the DNA sequence

inputs.name: DEVICE
inputs.description: Device to use for the ChatNT model (-1 for CPU, 0+ for GPU)
